modules.name: Coerce
modules.description: Quantize an incoming polyphonic signal to voltages of another polyphonic signal.

modules.name: Coerce6
modules.description: Quantize incoming polyphonic signals to voltages of another polyphonic signal.

modules.name: ReX
modules.description: Expander for several SIM modules, modifying start, length and order

modules.name: InX
modules.description: Input expander for several SIM modules. Adds 16 inputs to the module.
